products.title: Genesis Plain Luxe Soft Cream Roller Blind
products.description: The genesis plain luxe cream offers a simple and stylish enhancement for your windows. This practical roller blind is designed with convenience in mind. Whatever room you hang this blind will also benefit from the dimout effect and uplifting cream colourway that will give the space a bright splash of warmth whatever time of day. products.title: Genesis Cream Roller Blind
products.description: Use this blind to tone down a vibrant or vintage scheme with its fresh simplicity, or alternatively to enhance the minimalist chic of a contemporary room. The genesis cream roller blind is made from durable dimout fabric in a delightful creamy shade that is sure to uplift your space whether dressing a window in living room, hallway or kitchen. products.title: Genesis Blackout Cream Roller Blind
products.description: Whether pairing with minimalist monochromes or pretty pastels, this genesis blackout cream roller blind is a treat for any window. The pale cream tone is so versatile as it can appear warm alongside a traditional scheme whilst bringing a crisp and fresh feel to your space. Light and airy it may be, but this blind is also highly effective at blocking light to increase peace and privacy. products.title: Genesis Cream Perfect Fit Roller Blind
products.description: Their genesis range comes in 6 colour variations and is the perfect choice for a modern look. This cream perfect fit roller blind is ideal for any room in your home due to the neutral tone of the fabric. The perfect fit aspect of this blind means it can clip straight on to pvc window frames - saving space and meaning no drills or screws.
